did.unittitle: Angela Y. Lean "San Francisco's 1938 National Dollar Store Strike: An Opportunity for Change" Manuscript
did.abstract: This is a Senior Essay for the History Dept. at Yale University, April 12, 1993, by Angela Y. Lean.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of "San Francisco's 1938 National Dollar Store Strike: An Opportunity for Change," by Angela Y. Lean.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

did.unittitle: "San Francisco's 1938 National Dollar Store Strike: An Opportunity for Change"

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: By Angela Y. Lean; April 21, 1993; 44 pages, plus appendixes, bibliography, and bibliographic essay.
